sn2.30:1.3: sahali → sahalī (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed) | nīko → niṅko (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); niko (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli2ed) | vegabbhari ca → veṭambarī ca (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
sn2.30:4.4: Na hi nūna tādisaṃ karoti → naha nūna tādī pakaroti (bj, cck, sya1ed, km, pts-vp-pli2ed); nahi nūna tādī pakaroti (sya2ed)
sn2.30:10.1: Sahācaritena → sahāravenāpi (bj, pts-vp-pli2ed); saha racitena (sya-all); sagāravenāpi (pts-vp-pli1ed) | sigālo → siṅgālo (mr)
sn2.30:17.2: nakkhattānaṃva candimā → nakkhattānañca candimā (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
